content.rendered:
Our listings

land & sections

736sqm Section In the heart of Avarua

Prime leasehold land within a short stroll of downtown Avarua  

Property ID: JT0087

  • Residential leasehold ownership until 2061
  • Prime leasehold land of 736sqm situated in the heart of Avarua amidst quiet residential surroundings
  • Conveniently located within an easy 5-minute stroll of Avarua CBD, including The Lazy Trout Cafe, Ariki Cafe, and Tuakata Cafe in the direct vicinity

$79,000 (+vat if any)

Enquire now
1,001sqm Oceanfront Section In Matavera

Residential leasehold land with oceanview frontage

Property ID: JT0086

  • Residential leasehold ownership until 2058
  • Flat-level section of 1,001sqm situated on the main road in Matavera, with oceanview frontage
  • Purposed for residential use and purposes ancillary thereto
  • Picturesque mountain backdrop

$170,000 

Enquire now
1,500sqm Section In Kiikii with glimpse of sea

Opportunity to complete a steel framed structure with approved plans

Property ID: JT0076

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2065
  • Section of 1,500sqm situated on the back road in Kiikii Tapere, Tupapa, conveniently located on the outskirts of Avarua CBD
  • Land already excavated with concrete block and slab foundation and steel construction materials ready to complete a structure of 134sqm with approved plans
  • Picturesque mountain backdrop and glimpse of the sea

$165,000 (+vat if any)

Enquire now
Elevated 3-Acre Section in Aitutaki With Magnificent Panoramic Lagoon Views!

Vendor seeking offers!

Property ID: JT0014

  • Superb 3 acre elevated section of 12,244sqm situated in Avanui, Aitutaki
  • Spectacular panoramic views over Aitutaki lagoon and Aitutaki Village Resort
  • Commercial lease until 2048
  • Mainly flat-level, easy access, electricity supply available

Offers Invited

Enquire now
SOLD! 3/4 Acre section situated opposite Ta'akoka Islet

Very rare opportunity to acquire land in renowned Muri Beach!

Property ID: JT0022

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2048
  • Almost 3/4 acre vacant flat-level commercial section in renowned Muri Beach
  • Situated opposite Ta'akoka islet; main road access; handy to cafés & amenities at Muri Village
  • Land area excludes beachfront reserve
SOLD
SOLD - Renowned Turtle House

At Avana Passage residential land with fantastic oceanview frontage

Property ID: JT0078

  • Residential leasehold ownership until December 2059
  • Generous flat-level section of 3,255sqm with oceanfront frontage near historic Avana Passage in Ngatangiia
  • Renowned 'Turtle House' site with 2-level concrete structure that has been used as a private residence
SOLD
SOLD - 1/2 Acre Vacant Section in Puka Uenga

Commercial leasehold land in desirable elevated area close to airport and main town

Property ID: JT0064

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2071
  • Half-acre section of 1,958sqm in quiet elevated side street in Puka Uenga
  • Tranquil location and desirable area within close proximity to Rarotonga Airport, Avarua Main Town, and Tereora College
SOLD
SOLD - 1.4 acre Beachfront Section in Aitutaki

Commercial leasehold land in a desirable area of Aitutaki with brand new 60 year lease

Property ID: JT0012

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2071
  • Half-acre section of 1,958sqm in quiet elevated side street in Puka Uenga
  • Tranquil location and desirable area within close proximity to Rarotonga Airport, Avarua Main Town, and Tereora College
SOLD
SOLD - 5 Individual Sections on Manea Nui estate

Perfect plot for your new home or multiple sections for your dream project with new 60 year lease

Property ID: JT041, JT042, JT043, JT044

  • Brand new commercial leases of 60 years
  • 4 vacant plots of 2,510sqm, 2,550sqm, 2,980sqm, and 3,370sqm with tropical fruit trees
  • 2 elevated vacant sections with potential to capture sea views
  • Quiet back road location on the sunset west coast of Rarotonga
SOLD
SOLD - 1/3rd acre Beachfront section in Matavera

Prime beachfront with 180° panoramic sea view and mountain backdrop

Property ID: JT007

  • 1/3rd acre section of 1,301 sqm in Tuiakana Matavera with sublease of 50 years
  • 180° panoramic view to Avana Point
  • picturesque mountain backdrop
  • Close to Te Uki Ou Primary School and handy to amenities in Muri Village
SOLD
SOLD - Section close to airport and town

Excellent location, quiet side street, and potential to build an elevated home with mountain view & glimpse of the sea

Property ID: JT004

  • Large half-acre section in Puka Uenga of 1930m2 with lease of 42 years
  • Close proximity to the airport, main town of Avarua, and Tereora College
SOLD
